artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: After Paul Pontius (Du Pont); Engraver: Alexander Bannerman

Hollstein 129 (Pontius; copy)
New Hollstein (Dutch and Flemish) 93 (Van Dyck VII)
description: half length portrait turned left looking out at viewer; wearing coat with large collar and cuffs; holding a letter in his right hand and gesturing with his left; reverse of original engraving by Paul Pontius after Van Dyck
inscription:

title: Portrait of Henry Steenwyck
